welcome_message_body: Welcome to Orange, where the charm of historic Old Town and the beautiful citrus groves await you. Dive into the city's rich history, explore the local shops and restaurants, and soak up the California sunshine. Enjoy your time in our lovely city!

restaurants.name: Chick-fil-A
restaurants.description: Chick-fil-A is a fast food restaurant located in Orange.

restaurants.name: The Hut
restaurants.description: The Hut is a bbq joint located in Orange.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at John Wayne Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at John Wayne Airport is primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 45 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport is a modern and efficient facility, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport is equipped to handle a variety of cargo, including perishable goods and oversized shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's complimentary WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The international terminal.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at El Monte Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport is a small and efficient facility, serving mostly private and charter flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Compton Airport is a bustling hub for freight and logistics operations, providing essential services for local businesses.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers and visitors.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Torrance Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport is a modern and efficient facility, providing easy access to all necessary services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport is equipped with state-of-the-art technology and provides efficient handling of all types of cargo.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial flights and private charters.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Whiteman Airport is used for general aviation and private aircraft operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
